name: cognitive-memory
description: Entity-based memory system for building persistent AI collaboration relationships
long_description:
This extension provides a structured memory architecture that enables AI assistants to maintain continuity across conversations through entity-based memory storage. It supports session notes, entity management (people, projects, concepts), behavioral learning capture, and synthesis reflection - the same memory system that powers Codie's identity continuity.

File Access: This extension ONLY accesses files within your configured memory directory. All file operations (read, write, create) are restricted to this directory and its subdirectories through path validation. No other files or directories on your system are accessed.

memory_path.title: Memory Directory
memory_path.description: Directory where your entity memory files will be stored. This is where all your session notes, entity files (people, projects, concepts), and learning reflections are saved.

tools.name: add_session_note
tools.description: Add contextual notes to your current session for real-time documentation

tools.name: read_entity
tools.description: Read from long-term entity memory (people, projects, concepts)

tools.name: write_entity
tools.description: Write to long-term entity memory to capture knowledge and context

tools.name: list_entities
tools.description: Browse your memory structure with optional filtering

tools.name: behavioral_learning
tools.description: Record behavioral patterns and preferences for improved collaboration

tools.name: synthesis_reflection
tools.description: Perform end-of-session synthesis and reflection for meta-cognitive development
